description: Zination is a software development firm with 15+ years of experience in building web applications, mobile apps, chatbots, and e-commerce solutions. I worked as a junior front-end developer engaged in building web applications for multiple clients.

Hanaboso offers data integration and cloud-based solutions to help businesses grow and improve their processes and customer communication. Here, I was responsible for building the front end for web applications along with other team members.

Spontivly is a Community Management System that offers real-time analytics for measuring community engagement, growth, and impact across different platforms. I worked as a full-stack developer, responsible for building, deploying, and maintaining web applications along with team management
